sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
England's restitution or The man, the man of men, the states-man. delivered in several sermons in the parish church of Waltham Abbey in the county of Essex. / By Thomas Reeve D.D. preacher of Gods word there. Reeve, Thomas, 1594-1672.
[12], 162, [2] p.
Printed by Iohn Redmayne, for William Grantham, at the black Bear in S. Paul's Church-yard, near the little north door, London : 1661.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 26"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been altered to read "0". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[12], 162, [2] p.
Printed by Iohn Redmayne, for William Grantham, at the black Bear in S. Paul's Church-yard, near the little north door, London : 1661.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 26"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been altered to read "0". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
